name: Line Tower Wars VR
description:
The gameplay is a copy of Line Tower Wars from Warcraft: Frozen Throne but in VR. The game is just a prototype with minimal animation and sound, and all art is taken from different sources from Sketchfab. There are no upgrades for the two turrets and only 6 waves of enemies. 

  •  Right controller
    • Joystick --> Speed up or Slow down game
    • Button A --> Change turret to place
    • Trigger --> Place the turret
  •  Left controller
    • Joystick --> Rotate table and lower or rise up table
    • Grip --> Move table
    • Trigger --> Remove already placed turret
